title: Bloomberg Markets: Automakers Poised for Best Month of the Year
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Automakers Poised for Best Month of the Year
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Jamie Butters\u0010U.S. Autos Reporter \u0010Bloomberg News \u0010Discussing U.S. auto market probably expanded for the first time this year as consumers started to replace vehicles following Hurricane Harvey, which probably damaged more cars than any storm in history.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
